mapper.sql: study_seat_id, study_user_id, study_user_name, study_start_time, study_end_time, study_user_part
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study ( id, study_seat_id, study_user_id, study_user_name, study_start_time, study_end_time, study_user_part ) VALUES ( #{study.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{study.studySeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{study.studyEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{study.studyUserPart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id, study_seat_id, study_user_id, study_user_name, study_start_time, study_end_time, study_user_part

INSERT INTO study( id, study_seat_id, study_user_id, study_user_name, study_start_time, study_end_time, study_user_part )VALUES
( #{study.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{study.studySeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{study.studyEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{study.studyUserPart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from seat where seat_time_start between #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd}
select sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, study_start_time, study_end_time)) as sum from study where study_user_part =#{studyUserPart}
